data.name: Cursed Pantsu
data.detailed_description:
Kaori is a good girl who always does the right thing. But one day, succumbed to temptation, she had stolen panties in the Mall...
She found herself in an eerie place, similar to the crime scene. Everything is against her here, but she meets a young girl named Akari. The new friend claims that she knows how to get out of this place. And for this, you need to steal panties again!

Cursed Pantsu is a story-driven action-adventure game with RPG and platforming elements about Kaori’s adventures in the Hellish Mall.

  • Creepy atmosphere of surreal Hellish Mall full of dangers and secrets.
  • Charming saleswomen are ready to serve or to kill you. You need panties. Strip off their cloth to get it!
  • Collect cloth and defeat enemies to become stronger and learn new abilities.
  • Solve the pantsu-thievery mystery!
  • Money is power here. Literally, use the money to defeat your enemies.

data.short_description: Kaori is a good girl who always does the right thing. But one day, succumbed to temptation, she had stolen panties in the Mall... Cursed Pantsu is a story-driven action-adventure game with RPG and platforming elements about Kaori’s adventures in the Hellish Mall.
data.supported_languages: English, Traditional Chinese, Simplified Chinese, Japanese

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-2100, AMD FX-4100
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD4600, Nvidia GT730
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-7400, AMD Ryzen 1200
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX760, AMD RX550
  • Storage: 5 GB available space

content_descriptors.notes:
Nudity. Underwear fetishism. The player is attacking female characters and tearing off their clothes.
Suggestive themes and strong language.

All characters in the game are over the age of 18.
